body.p: All three methods open the DITA transformation type dialog box. This dialog presents the list of possible outputs that the DITA OT Transformation is able to produce. Select the transformation type, click OK and move on to configuring the options in the New Scenario dialog. This dialog allows you to configure the options that control the transformation.
